Definition: "Resample the time-resolution by averaging over every ``n`` snapshots

Description: Add an overall absolute carbon-dioxide emissions limit configured in ``electricity: co2limit``. If a float is appended an overall emission limit relative to the emission level given in ``electricity: co2base`` is added (e.g. ``Co2L0.05`` limits emissisions to 5% of what is given in ``electricity: co2base``)
Alter the capital cost (``c``), installable potential (``p``) or marginal costs (``m``) of a carrier by a factor. Example: ``solar+c0.5`` reduces the capital cost of solar to 50\% of original values.
Add distribution grid with investment costs of ``n`` times costs in ``data/costs_{cost_year}.csv``
Sets the CO2 sequestration potential to ``n`` Mt CO2 per year
